submission:
class Solution:
    def numberOfAlternatingGroups(self, colors: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(colors)
        colors = 2 * colors
        i = 0
        j = 1
        f = colors[i]
        res = 0
        while i < n:
            while j - i < k:
                if 1 - f != colors[j]:
                    i = j
                    f = colors[i]
                    j += 1
                    break
                f = 1 - f
                j += 1
            else:
                res += 1
                i += 1
        return res
